tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V4.2.4.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: Welcome to the Weekend
programme.desc: Light-hearted, inclusive and entertaining, Welcome to the Weekend focuses on not just the football but also on the lifestyle topics that footballers and fans love.(n)

programme.title: Premier League Preview
programme.desc: Preview all the upcoming Premier League fixtures.(n)

programme.title: Viva LaLiga - Saturday
programme.desc: Viva LaLiga brings you all the latest news and analysis from across LaLiga.(n)

programme.title: Team Talks
programme.desc: Join the team as they tackle all the major talking points as the players and the managers have their say ahead of the weekend action.(n)

programme.title: Espanyol v Vallecano
programme.desc: Season: 2022/2023. Saturday 20th August.(n)

programme.desc: Season: 2022/2023. Saturday 20th August.(n)

programme.title: Hokkaido Consadole Sapporo v Sagan
programme.desc: Season: 2022. Saturday 20th August.(n)

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur v Wolverhampton Wanderers
programme.desc: Season: 2022/2023. Saturday 20th August.(n)

programme.title: Goal Rush - Overnight Saturday
programme.desc: Here's your hub for the night ahead, as you watch Everton v Nottingham Forest plus updates of every goal and key moment from around the grounds!(n)

programme.title: Bournemouth v Arsenal
programme.desc: Season: 2022/2023. Sunday 21st August.(n)

programme.title: Matchday Live Extra
programme.desc: Join us for a complete review of all the day’s Premier League football, with highlights and studio discussion.(n)

programme.title: Goal Rush - Overnight Sunday
programme.desc: Here's your hub for the night ahead, as you watch xxx plus updates of every goal and key moment from around the grounds!(n)

programme.title: Newcastle United v Manchester City
programme.desc: Season: 2022/2023. Monday 22nd August.(n)

programme.title: The Weekend Wrap
programme.desc: The Weekend Wrap features comprehensive match highlights, the best post-match reaction and expert analysis from a high-class team of pundits.(n)

programme.title: The Kelly & Wrighty Show
programme.desc: Arsenal legend Ian Wright is joined by Kelly Cates and a host of Premier League personalities as they take a more in-depth look at the headlines that follow the football each weekend and explore issues and topics away from the pitch.(n)

programme.title: Generation xG
programme.desc: A deep dive into the tactical trends and statistical insights of modern football with input from players, managers and data experts from the fanalytics community.(n)

programme.title: Manchester United v Liverpool
programme.desc: Season: 2022/2023. Tuesday 23rd August.(n)

programme.title: The Final Word
programme.desc: Michael Owen and special guests will join Steve Bower to give the definitive verdict on the weekend’s action.(n)

programme.title: Premier League Highlights Show
programme.desc: Catch up on all the latest action from the Premier League.(n)

programme.title: Netbusters
programme.desc: All the best angles of all the best goals from the latest Premier League action.(n)

programme.title: LaLiga Highlights Show
programme.desc: Catch up on all the latest action from the LaLiga.(n)

programme.title: Yashomati Maiyya Ke Nandlala
programme.desc: Many a story has been told about Krishna, but here's the story of Yashomati, her desire for a child, finding Krishna and the affectionate relationship between them.(n)

programme.title: Punyashlok Ahilya Bai
programme.desc: The period drama set in the 18th century, based on the life of Ahilyabai Holkar, who with the support of her father-in-law Malhar Rao Holkar, defied the pre-defined norms of the patriarchal society.(n)

programme.title: Mere Sai - Shraddha Aur Saburi
programme.desc: This is the story of Shirdi Sai Baba. When Sai steps in, miracles happen. Follow his teachings of faith and patience in this devotional show.(n)

programme.title: Vighnaharta Ganesh
programme.desc: The mythological story of Ganesh. Follow the interesting journey of how Ganesh became the elephant headed god and the destroyer of all obstacles.(n)

programme.desc: The mythological story of Ganesh. Follow the interesting journey of how Ganesh became the elephant headed god and the destroyer of all obstacles.(n)

programme.desc: Many a story has been told about Krishna, but here's the story of Yashomati, her desire for a child, finding Krishna and the affectionate relationship between them.(n)

programme.title: Kaun Banega Crorepati
programme.desc: Kaun Banega Crorepati-2022 Amitabh Bachchan returns as the megastar host of the worlds' iconic quiz show and gives contestants the chance to take the 'Hot Seat' and win a life changing 70 million Rupees.(n)

programme.title: Mann Mein Vishwaas Hai
programme.desc: This show deals with stories that are real-life incidents experienced by people. They mainly revolve around faith.(n)

programme.title: Crime Patrol
programme.desc: Join India's police force in action as they deal with criminal activities around the country in this dramatisation of real life crime stories, narrated by Anup Soni.(n)

programme.title: Superstar Singer
programme.desc: Children from across India are mentored and judged by famous playback singers from the Hindi film industry. They compete against each other in various rounds to win the coveted title and prize.(n)

programme.title: Appnapan - Badalate Rishton Ka Bandhan
programme.desc: Appnapan explores what happens when parents get divorced and the different ways this affects children and the challenges they face.(n)

programme.title: Crime Patrol 2.0
programme.desc: Crime Patrol 2.0, the popular award-winning show is back! Watch as the Indian police force solve more dark crimes and dangerous criminal activity. Stay alert and make sure you watch the new series.(n)

programme.desc: Legislation, Motions or Statements proposed by the Government.(n)

programme.title: Live Topical Issues
programme.desc: When Deputies who have raised a matter which is topical either nationally or within their constituency are answered by a Member of the Government.(n)

programme.title: Private Members' Business
programme.desc: Private Members Business is time set aside to debate a motion or legislation which is proposed by a party in opposition.(n)

programme.title: Leaders' Questions Replay
programme.desc: Where Party Leaders and the Leaders of recognised technical groups can put a question to An Taoiseach without notice.(n)

programme.title: Seanad Éireann Replay
programme.desc: Replay of current Seanad Éireann sittings.(n)
